import React from 'react' import { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { Plus, Airplay, Inbox, FileText, Search, Edit, Trash2, MinusCircle, PlusCircle, XCircle, } from "react-feather"; const sidebarNavigation = [ { name: "Sales", href: "#", icon: Airplay, current: true }, { name: "Register", href: "#", icon: Inbox, current: false }, { name: "Qutation", href: "#", icon: FileText, current: false }, { name: "", href: "#", icon: Airplay, current: false }, { name: "", href: "#", icon: Airplay, current: false }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" "); } export default function Navbar() { return ( <> {/* Narrow sidebar */}
{sidebarNavigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{/* Mobile menu */}
{sidebarNavigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{/* Dummy element to force sidebar to shrink to fit close icon */}
) }
